metadata.feature_description: Delete existing custom URLs from the system

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages, select Test Page One, go to Advanced > S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: URLs for this page section is displayed with custom URLs
steps.actual: URLs section displayed showing 5 URLs including custom URLs /my-custom-url-edited and /old-page-url

steps.action: Click the trash icon on the /old-page-url custom URL
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog appears asking to confirm deletion
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to remove this URL?' with Cancel and Delete buttons

steps.action: Click Delete button to confirm deletion
steps.expected: URL is deleted and removed from the list
steps.actual: URL /old-page-url was successfully deleted, list now shows 4 URLs instead of 5

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify deleted URL is removed from listings

steps.action: After deleting /old-page-url, examine the URLs for this page list
steps.expected: The deleted URL should no longer appear in the list
steps.actual: The /old-page-url is no longer in the list. Only 4 URLs remain: /my-custom-url-edited, /Test-Page-One, /TestPageOne, and /Test-Page-One (redirects)

steps.action: Click the trash icon on /my-custom-url-edited custom URL
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to remove this URL?'

steps.action: Click Cancel button in the confirmation dialog
steps.expected: URL should be preserved and remain in the list
steps.actual: URL /my-custom-url-edited was preserved and still appears in the list

steps.action: Click trash icon on /my-custom-url-edited (second custom URL)
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog appears for second URL
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared correctly for the second URL

steps.action: Confirm deletion of second custom URL
steps.expected: Second URL is deleted, only automatic URLs remain
steps.actual: URL /my-custom-url-edited was deleted. Only 1 URL remains: /Test-Page-One (Automatic)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Empty state - no custom URLs to delete

steps.action: After deleting all custom URLs, examine the URL list for available delete actions
steps.expected: No delete icons should appear for automatic URLs
steps.actual: Only the automatic URL /Test-Page-One remains. No trash/edit icons are displayed for automatic URLs - deletion is only available for custom URLs created by users

steps.expected: Automatic URLs should not have delete action available
steps.actual: The automatic URL /Test-Page-One does not have any action icons (trash or edit). The system correctly prevents deletion of system-generated automatic URLs

observations: Custom URLs are managed at the page level in Content > Pages > [Page Name] > Advanced > S.E.O. tab, not in the main SEO settings
The delete confirmation dialog provides clear messaging asking 'Are you sure you want to remove this URL?'
Automatic URLs (system-generated) cannot be deleted - no action icons are displayed for them
Only custom URLs (created by users, shown as 'SuperUser Account' in Generated By column) have trash/edit icons
The trash icon is the first action icon (index 0) and the edit icon is the second (index 1)
Deletion is immediate after confirmation - no page refresh required to see updated URL list
The Cancel button in the confirmation dialog correctly preserves the URL without deleting it
